title: Jewish Members of Congress Condemn “Offensive and Incendiary” UNESCO Resolution Blaming Israel for Recent Surge ...
text: ( Source : Jerrold Nadler ) WASHINGTON, D.C. - Today , U.S. Representatives Jerrold Nadler (D-NY), Sandy Levin (D-MI), Eliot Engel (D-NY), Nita Lowey (D-NY), Brad Sherman (D-CA), Jan Schakowsky (D-IL), Susan Davis (D-CA), Steve Israel (D-NY),
